verses.verse: Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> reigneth <S%H4427><s%>; let the peoples <S%H5971><s%> tremble <S%H7264><s%>: He sitteth <S%H3427><s%> above the cherubim <S%H3742><s%>; let the earth <S%H776><s%> be moved <S%H5120><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is great <S%H1419><s%> in Zion <S%H6726><s%>; And he is high <S%H7311><s%> above all the peoples <S%H5971><s%>.
Let them praise <S%H3034><s%> thy great <S%H1419><s%> and terrible <S%H3372><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>: Holy is he <S%H6918><s%>.

The king <S%H4428><s%>'s strength <S%H5797><s%> also loveth <S%H157><s%> justice <S%H4941><s%>; Thou dost establish <S%H3559><s%> equity <S%H4339><s%>; Thou executest <S%H6213><s%> justice <S%H4941><s%> and righteousness <S%H6666><s%> in Jacob <S%H3290><s%>.
Exalt <S%H7311><s%> ye Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>, And worship <S%H7812><s%> at his footstool <S%H7272><s%>: Holy is he <S%H6918><s%>.

Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> among his priests <S%H3548><s%>, And Samuel <S%H8050><s%> among them that call <S%H7121><s%> upon his name <S%H8034><s%>; They called <S%H7121><s%> upon Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and he answered them <S%H6030><s%>.

He spake <S%H1696><s%> unto them in the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of cloud <S%H6051><s%>: They kept <S%H8104><s%> his testimonies <S%H5713><s%>, And the statute <S%H2706><s%> that he gave them <S%H5414><s%>.

Thou answeredst <S%H6030><s%> them <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah our God <S%H430><s%>: Thou wast a God <S%H410><s%> that forgavest <S%H5375><s%> them <S%H5358><s%>, Though thou tookest vengeance of their doings <S%H5949><s%>.

Exalt <S%H7311><s%> ye Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>, And worship <S%H7812><s%> at his holy <S%H6944><s%> hill <S%H2022><s%>; For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> is holy <S%H6918><s%>.
